author: Shannon H
description:
Bring Her Back is the Philippou Brothers’ directorial follow up to their hit debut, Talk to Me (2022), which was one of my favourites from that year. Like their debut, Bring Her Back is a contemporary supernatural horror flick set in Australia. Where the earlier Talk to Me had teenagers using a cursed hand to […]

The post REVIEW: Bring Her Back (2025) appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Bring Her Back (2025)
